pages.title: Order of Waking
pages.text: Cast the $(item)Alchemical Spark$() into the Heart when the sky is bare.$(br)The Wardens stir by the old law: $(b)North$(), then $(b)East$(), afterward $(b)South$(), and lastly $(b)West$().

pages.title: Measure of Power
pages.text: At the third stirring, the Breath coils inward like a serpent of light, swelling toward fullness.$(br)Then does the Pillar rise, and for a span the world remembers the dawn.
